sorry, my comment might be misleadingly placed, i'm not against the 'if/task.args' update, but on how you inject the default here, just use normal play object inheritance upto this point.

Possibly the best place to 'resolve' the default is the task after it checks parents for inheritance. We don't have a clear rule, for example have strategy set this way, but most other defaults are populated in play_context. @jimi-c any opinions on this?

my reasoning applies to those as well, this is not specific to your change.
Can I go ahead and move the defaulting to play_context or should I wait on an opinion on Play vs PlayContext by @jimi-c?
go ahead, we might even merge as is and revamp later to have a consistent path for these types of configs
